Cryptocurrency is a relatively recent development. The data used is from the cryptocurrency market from the top 5 cryptocurrencies. Relevant data from the dataset was sorted out to visualize the market spikes. Spikes in individual cryptocurrencies correlate to the crypto market as a whole.
